articles.title: Derek Chauvin to be sentenced for murder of George Floyd - live updates - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Derek Chauvin faces up to 30 years in prison when he is sentenced on Friday for the killing of George Floyd, the African American man whose death sparked a global protest movement.
articles.content:
But Professor Richard Frase, from the University of Minnesota's Law School, told The Telegraph he would be very surprised if Chauvin declined to address the judge.
